import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Sidebar from "../components/sidebar"; export default function Admin() { const [researchTitle, setTitle] = useState(""); const [researchYear, setYear] = useState(""); const [category, setCategory] = useState(""); const [file, setFile] = useState(""); const submitFile= async(e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("Title", researchTitle); formData.append("Year", researchYear); formData.append("Category", category); formData.append("File", file); console.log(researchTitle, researchYear, category, file); const uploadAPI = await axios.post("http://localhost:8081/upload-pdf", formData, { headers: { "Content-type" : "multipart/form-data", }, }); console.log(uploadAPI); alert(uploadAPI.data.status); } return( <>
